description: Amazfit has launched the Active 2 Square smartwatch in a single Black colour option. It features a 1.75-inch AMOLED display and has Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity. It is equipped with the BioTracker 6.0 PPG sensor for tracking heart rate and SpO2 levels. The watch supports over 160 sports modes and packs a 260mAh battery.
title: Amazfit Active 2 Square Debuts With 1.75-Inch AMOLED Display and Up to 10 Days Battery Life

description: A Nintendo Direct presentation dedicated to Donkey Kong Bananza has been announced. The game will launch exclusively on Nintendo Switch 2 on July 17. The Direct presentation will likely include a gameplay deep dive.
title: Nintendo Direct Livestream Featuring Donkey Kong Bananza Announced for June 18

description: Samsung’s Exynos 2500 system-on-a-chip (SoC) is now confirmed to feature satellite connectivity for emergency messaging. The confirmation came from Skylo, a US-based non-terrestrial network (NTN) provider, on Monday. This is the second confirmed information about the South Korean tech giant’s next-generation 3nm processor, whose development was first announced last year.
title: Samsung’s Exynos 2500 SoC Confirmed to Feature Satellite Connectivity Ahead of Galaxy Z Flip 7 Launch

description: Apple Watch Ultra 3 is said to be in the works. While Apple is yet to confirm its arrival, prominent analyst Jeff Pu states that Watch Ultra 3 will be unveiled this year alongside the Apple Watch Series 11 and HomePod 6 smart speaker. The brand could launch the Watch Series 12, AirPods Pro 3, and a new Apple Vision Pro next year.
title: Apple Watch Ultra 3 Said to Launch This Year; Product Roadmap for Next Three Years Leaked

description: Asus has launched its latest lineup of Vivobook laptops in India. The company has introduced four models. The Vivobook S16 OLED is an AI PC powered by up to an Intel Core Ultra 7 chipset. There's also a standard S16 model which sports a 16-inch 144Hz screen. Meanwhile, the two Vivobook S14 laptops have a sandwich metal design, 14-inch screens, and a full HD IR camera with a physical privacy shutter.
title: Asus Unveils Refreshed Vivobook S16, S16 OLED Laptops in India Alongside Vivobook S14: Price, Features

description: The Nothing Phone 3 will launch in India on July 1 with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, the company confirmed in a press release. It is claimed to offer overall better performance than the preceding Phone 2. The handset will be available in the country, alongside the Nothing Headphone 1, via Flipkart. The upcoming products will go on sale in the US and Canada as well.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Confirmed to Come With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC Ahead of July 1 Launch

description: Reddit Community Intelligence, a new artificial intelligence (AI) engine for advertisement tools, was unveiled by the company on Monday. The announcement took place at the Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity, where Reddit also showcased two new AI ad tools which are currently in early stage. These tools are dubbed Reddit Insights and Conversation Summary Add-Ons.
title: Reddit Unveils Reddit Community Intelligence, Its Suite of AI-Powered Ad Tools for Enterprises

description: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G will launch in India soon. It is claimed to come in new colour options with a lightweight design. A microsite created by Amazon shows the rear design of the phone. The phone is seen with a triple rear camera unit. The Galaxy M36 5G is confirmed to be priced below Rs. 20,000 in the country.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G India Launch Teased; Rear Design and Price Range Revealed

description: Sony has launched the Bravia 8 II QD-OLED TV series in India, equipped with the XR processors with AI. The lineup supports Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and Acoustic Surface Audio+ technologies. The TV series supports 4K gaming at 120fps, variable refresh rate, and PS5-optimised settings. The TVs also support Netflix Adaptive and Sony Pictures Core modes, as well as free credits to stream 4K HDR and IMAX Enhanced movies.
title: Sony Bravia 8 II QD-OLED TV Series With Acoustic Surface+ Audio, Studio Calibrated Mode Launched in India

description: Google unveiled its Safety Charter for India, highlighting how it is using artificial intelligence (AI) technology to identify and prevent instances of cybercrimes across its products. The Mountain View-based tech giant highlighted that with the rise of India’s digital economy, the need for trust-based systems was high. The company is now using AI in its products, country-wide programmes, and to detect and remove vulnerabilities in enterprise software.
title: Google Unveils India-Focused Safety Charter, Shares How It Is Using AI to Combat Online Frauds and Scams

description: Ubisoft has issued an update on the Prince of Persia: Sands of Time remake, saying it was still "deep" into development. The game is set for launch in 2026. The remake project was announced in 2020 and has since faced several delays.
title: Prince of Persia: Sands of Time Remake Remains "Deep" in Development, Says Ubisoft

description: Realme Buds Wireless 5 Lite will launch in India on June 23 and will be available via Amazon. The neckband-style wireless earphones use a 12.4mm dynamic bass driver, offer dual device connectivity, and get an IP55 dust and water-resistant rating. The Buds Wireless 5 Lite are claimed to offer a total battery life of up to 35 hours on a single charge. They will feature magnetic earbuds and functional, physical buttons.
title: Realme Buds Wireless 5 Lite India Launch Date Set for June 23; Availability Details, Key Features Revealed

description: OpenAI executives have reportedly considered accusing Microsoft of anticompetitive behavior in their partnership. OpenAI's effort could involve seeking a federal regulatory review of the terms of its contract with Microsoft for potential violations of antitrust law, as well as a public campaign.
title: OpenAI Executives Said to Be Weighing Antitrust Accusation Against Microsoft

description: Poco F7 5G will launch in India on June 24 and will be available in the country via Flipkart. The phone will be unveiled in select global markets on the same day. It will come with a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit and a Snapdragon chipset. The Poco F7 5G Indian variant will be backed by a 7,550mAh battery with 90W fast charging and 22.5W reverse charging support.
title: Poco F7 5G India Launch Date Set for June 24; to Debut in Global Markets On the Same Day

description: The price of Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra in India has been slashed for a limited time. Launched at a starting price of Rs. 1,29,999, the flagship handset is currently selling with a Rs. 12,000 discount. Additionally, buyers can also take advantage of exchange offers and no-cost EMI options to further lower the effective price and enjoy flexible payment plans.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price in India Discounted for a Limited Time: Check Offers, Availability

description: Trump Media and Technology Group is seeking to launch an exchange-traded fund (ETF) that will invest in both Bitcoin and Ethereum.  Trump Media has yet to reveal fees for the bitcoin ETF. Similar products have fees of 0.12 percent.
title: Trump Media Seeks SEC Approval for Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF

description: The Trump Organisation has launched a mobile network called Trump Mobile and phone to go along with it, called the T1. The handset is listed with a price tag of $499 (roughly Rs. 42,000) and is currently up for pre-order in the US. It is said to offer a 6.8-inch AMOLED screen and pack a 5,000mAh battery with support for 20W fast charging.
title: Trump Mobile T1 Smartphone With 6.8-Inch Display, 5,000mAh Battery Announced; Price, Specifications

description: Ace is a Tamil action-comedy film starring Vijay Sethupathi as Bold Kannan. Set in Malaysia, the movie blends crime, humour and redemption. Directed by Arumuga Kumar, it’s now streaming on Amazon Prime Video after its theatrical release on May 22, 2025.
title: Ace Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About Vijay Sethupathi Starrer Movie

description: When a 24-year-old girl is found dead and is termed to be a suicide, later known to be a brutal case of murder, investigator Officer Vikran is investigating this mystery case, where the suspects are her husband, stepchildren, and even maid, revealing some dark secrets and truths. A piece to the puzzle keeps adding up, and now Vikram needs to find the killer as time keeps running out
title: Blind Spot Starring Naveen Chandra Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video

description: Gearbox CEO Randy Pitchford drew criticism last month after suggesting that "real fans" woudn't mind paying $80 for a game. Now, publisher 2K has confirmed that the Standard Edition of Borderlands 4 will be priced at $70. The game will launch on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X on September 12.
title: Borderlands 4 Won't Cost $80 After All as 2K Confirms Pricing and Pre-Order Details

description: Dear Uma, which premiered on June 13 on Sun NXT, follows a daughter discovering her late mother’s secrets through unsent letters. With Radhika Apte and Shefali Shah in lead roles, this Telugu drama is acclaimed for its poetic narrative and emotional depth, making it a must-watch 2025 release.
title: Dear Uma Now Available for Streaming on Sun NXT: What You Need to Know About Poetic Drama

description: Echo Valley, a Julianne Moore and Sydney Sweeney Starrer, is an American Thriller movie that follows a mother who does everything to protect her daughter after finding her covered in someone else’s blood. Watch now only on Apple TV+.
title: Echo Valley Now Streaming on Apple TV+: Everything You Need to Know

description: The Meta AI app is now showing a warning message informing users about the consequences of sharing a conversation publicly. The warning message tells users to avoid posting conversation that could contain personal or sensitive information. Last week, several users and reports spotted a large number of seemingly personal conversations posted on the app’s Discover feed.
title: Meta AI App Now Shows a Warning Message to Dissuade Users from Publicly Sharing Private Chats

description: While the OnePlus Nord 5 is confirmed to get a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC, the Nord CE 5 variant is expected to come with a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset. Both smartphones are tipped to pack 5,200mAh batteries with 80W SuperVOOC charging support. They are said to be equipped with 50-megapixel dual rear camera units and 120Hz AMOLED screens.
title: OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 Colour Options, Key Specifications Leaked

description: OnePlus Pad Lite and OnePlus Watch 3 43mm will be launched in European markets alongside the OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 during the OnePlus Summer Launch Event that's scheduled for July 8. The wearable is confirmed to go official in the US as well on the same day. Meanwhile, key specifications of the Watch 3 43mm have leaked online.
title: OnePlus Pad Lite, OnePlus Watch 3 43mm to Launch on July 8 Alongside Nord 5 Series

description: Rematch is a mini-series that follows a chess champion, Garry Kasparov, who competes with a new generation supercomputer, Deep Blue, by IBM, to fight in a chess competition. He has to put all of himself at stake to defend humanity. Will he be able to make it? Streaming soon.
title: Rematch OTT Release Revealed: Know Where to Stream it Online

description: Samsung will introduce several new health features on the Galaxy Watch with the upcoming One UI 8 Watch update. The new Bedtime Guidance feature informs the user about the optimal time to go to sleep. Meanwhile, Vascular Load measures the amount of stress on the vascular system during sleep. The update will also bring Antioxidant Index and Running Coach features on the Galaxy Watch.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch to Get Bedtime Guidance, Vascular Load Features With One UI 8 Watch Update

description: The OnePlus 13 already received a good design refresh this year giving fans a slimmer form factor with flatter sides. The phone also offered a better IP rating and got magnetic cases with supporting accessories aside from overall quality improvements compared to the OnePlus 12. It seems that the OnePlus 15 could also receive a sizable update in the coming year with some notable hardware and design changes as per a new leak.
title: OnePlus 15 Tipped to Get Refreshed Design, Lower Resolution Display, and Different Camera Layout

description: Web search in ChatGPT received an update last week. With this, users will now experience higher quality responses, and better instruction following when making a query. Additionally, the artificial intelligence (AI) firm claims that the feature can now handle more complex queries, and work with longer context of the conversation.
title: OpenAI Improves Web Search Tool in ChatGPT, Can Now Handle More Complex Queries

description: Google Pixel 10 series is reported to feature macro photography on its telephoto (5x zoom) thanks to tele-macro setup. Unlike the ultrawide lens, which can focus closely, telephoto lenses offer better image quality and allow users to shoot from a distance. This distance helps avoid blocking light as well, which helps with macro shots. The Pixel 10 series is said to automatically switch between lenses based on distance.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Use a Tele-Macro Camera For Improved Close-Up Photography: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 series is expected to go official next month. While we wait for the formal reveal, fresh renders of the unannounced Galaxy Watch 8, Galaxy Watch 8 Classic, and Galaxy Watch Ultra 2025 have surfaced on the Web. They suggest that the three watches will sport a squircle design, as rumoured.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Series New Renders Leaked; Classic Variant Shown With Rotating Bezel

description: Meta has announced a partnership with Oakley for the development of a new pair of Smart Glasses. Dubbed Oakley Meta, the collaboration will see the development of a new generation of smart glasses, speculated to be aimed at cyclists and other athletes. The Oakley Meta smart glasses will be the third product developed between Meta and a subsidiary of the Italian eyewear company Luxottica.
title: Meta and Oakley Announce New Smart Glasses Collaboration, Launch Set for June 20

description: For years now, WhatsApp has been deliberating over bringing ads to its app and it has finally rolled them out. Ads will be displayed in the Updates tab, enabling businesses to promote their services or products. Further, it also introduces Channel subscriptions and Promoted Channels.
title: WhatsApp Announces Ads in Status, Channel Subscriptions, and More Features for Businesses
